title: Why Ya'll gotta play these AD mid laners?
body: Here I am, just trying to have a lovely game with my boi Galio .... and all of a sudden ... out of no where .... TALON, ZED, YASUO, ... and others.... Why??? plis no more! can't we just go back to that time where mid lane was full of magic and particles with beautiful out plays and Galio's passive was actually useful... I just really want to see AD mid laners fall out of the meta, like I'm not having a rage here or anything .. but Riot needs to love Galio some more plis! he is pretty much the least played champ in the game ... by a huge gap, he is actually pretty string ... provided you are vsing magic dmg :/ I cri ere tme.
